compare.title: Compare Center
compare.subtitle: Control how your stats are used in comparisons, then choose how you want to view results.
compare.privacy.title: Direct Compare Visibility
compare.privacy.description: Anonymous averages and percentiles always use every player's stats. Turn this on if you want to appear in direct, side by side comparisons with other players. Your raw data is never exposed, only comparison views.
compare.modes.title: Compare Modes
compare.modes.description: Choose how you want compare results to be presented. Modes always respect privacy settings.
compare.aggregated.description: Aggregated Compare shows how your team powers stack up against group averages and percentiles, using stats from every player who has saved their dashboard meta.
compare.aggregated.noTeams: No team data found in your dashboard meta.
compare.aggregated.explainer: Aggregated Compare uses team power from every player who has saved their dashboard meta, without identifying anyone directly.
compare.direct.description: Choose a player who has also enabled Direct Compare to view side by side statistics.
compare.direct.playerPicker.title: Select Player To Compare With
compare.direct.playerPicker.none: No players are currently eligible for direct compare.
compare.direct.loadingTeams: Loading team data for this player…
compare.direct.errorTeams: Failed to load teams for the selected player.
compare.direct.sxs.title: Teams Side-by-Side
compare.direct.teamComps.title: Team Compositions - click a tile for full team comparison
compare.direct.heroes.detailsSubtitle: Showing full hero stats for this team. Click the team tile again to close.
compare.direct.hero.noneTeamThem: No heroes on this team for the selected player.
compare.direct.research.title: Research Comparison
compare.direct.research.myNone: No research summary found for your account yet.
compare.direct.research.theirNone: Research summary not available for the selected player.
compare.direct.research.errorMe: Failed to load your research summary.
compare.direct.research.errorThem: Failed to load research for the selected player.
compare.direct.heroes.errorMe: Failed to load your heroes for team composition.
compare.direct.heroes.errorThem: Failed to load heroes for the selected player.
compare.direct.waitingForTeams: Waiting for both your teams and their teams to be available.
